copy.heading1: We're improving how you stay up to date with the FT.

consents.heading: Do you want top stories & features?
consents.label: Get the most from The Financial Times with personalised special reports, recommended reads and latest feature announcements.

consents.heading: Do you want invites & offers from the FT?
